text: i'm pierre account manager at aws and i

french software companies on their
journey to the cloud
and basically it consists of
understanding pretty well their business
their challenges in order to help them
grow help them bring their business to
the next level
a few years ago when i was working with
my colleague solution architect to help
an early stage a very early-stage
startup of two people
building their first solution
and
recently in the news i saw that they
raised more than 50 million euros they
hired more than 100 people all over the
world and they scaled
in the u.s and also in asia so that's
very cool to see that we were here we
were here at the beginning

and
